channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [updated] FalconStor Habanero (falconstor-software-habanero-service) has changed the description of the plan named annual-subscription
item.description: *before*: Pricing is based on source data in terabytes. Subscription commitment is for a full year with automatic renewal with monthly billing. If the service is cancelled, the remaining months of the annual subscription term will be billed. Starting price is $2,500 per month, which includes up to 250 TB active tier. There are no data retrieval fees from active tier. Archive unused or infrequently requested data to save cost on storage of long-term data. Restoring data from archive tier may take up to 12 hours. IBM Power11 server packages support Habanero components: PowerVS instance, object storage, data protection software and service for backup, disaster recovery and tape migration delivered as SaaS. Cloud packages for Habanero are: Small package, 250 TB @ $2,500/month, Medium package: 300 TB @ $3,000/month, Large package: 600 TB @ $6,000/month, *after*: Pricing is based on source data in terabytes. Subscription commitment is for a full year with automatic renewal with monthly billing and is discounted 30% off list price. If the service is cancelled, the remaining months of the annual subscription term will be billed. Starting price is $2,500 per month, which includes up to 250 TB active tier. There are no data retrieval fees from active tier. Archive unused or infrequently requested data to save cost on storage of long-term data. Restoring data from archive tier may take up to 12 hours. IBM Power11 server packages support Habanero as an all inclusive off site backup-DR-Archive solution which includes an On-Prem Appliance, Cloud infrastructure - PVS server & IBM COS, Software licensing and SaaS that creates an environment continually monitored by FalconStor Super Admin. Customers can use their earned P11 server package to cover their Habanero monthly charge to be used within 12 months.
